items.sentence: What's something that you normally only do on Mondays?
Let's face it, what you're trying to do is impossible.
Tom convinced Mary that she needed to go see a doctor.
After you left, Tom came over and we talked all night.
Tom has locked himself in his room and won't come out.
They suspect that Tom came into the country illegally.
The crowd held up homemade signs and started chanting.
Tom wasn't able to explain the situation very clearly.
When I got home, my mother and father were quarreling.
Rain or shine, I will come to meet you at the station.
